Headline: O'Hare0bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Oak Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Oak Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will remain available to provide connecting service between Forest Park and UIC/Halsted in both directions until 9:00am.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
